org.openimaj.demos.video

Class KinectDepthSnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.video.Video<MBFImage>
      • org.openimaj.demos.video.KinectDepthSnapshot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener, Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<MBFImage>, EventListener

    public class KinectDepthSnapshot
extends Video<MBFImage>
implements KeyListener
    Kinect integration demo. Shows video and depth. Press t to toggle between rgb and ir mode. Pressing w and x moves the device up or down. Pressing s levels the device.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
